#INTRODUCTION TO DATA WRANGLING

#talk about each function first
##functions: select, filter, mutate, arrange, summarize, top_n, group_by, joins

*step 1*:create dataset for season 1
```{r}
season1 = theoffice %>% 
  select(season, episode, episode_name, imdb_rating) %>% 
  filter(season == '01') %>% 
  group_by(episode, episode_name) %>% 
  #summarize(episode_name = paste(unique(episode_name), collapse = ", "))
  summarize(imdb_rating = paste(unique(imdb_rating), collapse = ", "))
View(season1)
```
